channel.title: 1Sat Ordinals Updates
channel.description: Latest updates and news from the 1Sat Ordinals protocol - Bitcoin SV token system

item.title: Building on Bedrock: The Case for Simple, Stable Protocols
item.description: Explore why simple, stable protocols like 1Sat Ordinals provide the best foundation for blockchain development. Learn from Bitcoin's philosophy of protocol stability.

item.title: 50MB File Support Now Live on Mainnet
item.description: Create massive NFTs and store entire applications on-chain with our expanded file size support, now available for all users.

item.title: Partnership with Major BSV Wallets
item.description: 1Sat Ordinals is now natively supported in HandCash, MoneyButton, and ElectrumSV, making token management easier than ever.
